CustomField.description: Once this limit is reached, Accounting Subledger will cancel the batch and display an error for the user to resolve. Common errors could be missing a required field or validation rule.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the maximum number of errors a batch can generate before it automatically cancels. Typically, one error is generated per payment record if a batch process fails.
CustomField.label: Number of Errors Allowed For Batch
